entry.title: The one time Evan Buckley was a genius.
entry.summary:
Author: anixxaj

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,795Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Ever since Albert and Ravi started dating, Buck would be making double date plans every time both he, Ravi and Eddie were off shift. It was actually pretty fun, they’ve been to a lot of interesting places, Buck had a whole list, it’s Buck of course he has a list. This week was dinner and drinks after, The dinner was pretty nice, it was mostly Ravi and Buck ranting about work and Eddie sometimes chiming in while Albert asked a million questions. This time Buck had picked a bar that’s close to both his and Eddie's place as well as Ravi's, They entered the bar and went to a booth. aka the counter sex fic

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 226,448Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 50

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 210,353Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Nothing Left To Do
entry.summary:
Author: hyperfixatedhoney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,457Chapters: 10/15Kudos: 55

Summary: “Buck,” Eddie is standing next to Buck but shifts to look Buck in the eye. There’s a look in Eddie’s eyes that Buck refuses to let himself acknowledge. It’s soft, welcoming, it makes Buck believe whatever Eddie says, “I’m sure it’ll be fine. We probably just missed out on a hitter, there was that one guy out of Austin Bobby was trying to get”“Yeah, you’re right,” Buck agreed, Eddie was right, it’ll be okay, “Well, nothing left to do but win huh?”Eddie smiles, gentle and sincere, “Nothing left to do but win”.OR: Buddie Baseball AU (no actual knowledge of baseball required)

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,558Chapters: 10/24Kudos: 37

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: But you know that you're needing it, And you know that you need it bad
entry.summary:
Author: Jason_Todds_Thigh_Holster

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,692Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: ''What are the facts here, Buck! Tell me them, because you should know that none of this, absolutely none of the fucked up shit you tell yourself is true, not even the slightest bit,'' ''It's facts that you want? Fine, here they are,'' Buck says, and the sufferance in his tone, the pain in his eyes, makes Eddie's throat go tight with emotion. ''We both know I should be in that coffin six-feet under instead of Bobby,'' ''You didn't..'' Didn't what? Didn't just say that? No, Eddie couldn't ask that because he knows too well that Buck had said it. ''Repeat that, what did you just say, Buck?'' Waiting for a response, Eddie swallows. He wants to weep, to cry until there's nothing left. His eyes burn, but he has nothing else to give. He's broken from his spiraling thoughts finding that Buck still hasn't responded. ''No,'' Eddie bleats. ''No, you can't - you cannot say something like that, Buck, don't..'' ''It should've been me. It always should've been me instead of Bobby,'' Buck insists, eyes squeezed shut. Willing the fresh gleam of tears to not cascade down the blonde's cheeks. ''And I'd reverse our roles instantly, I'd be the one in that coffin if it wasn't already nailed shut,''

entry.title: Beneath Your Crown
entry.summary:
Author: tinygiantsam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,546Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 15

Summary: "I do not belong to you, and I never will. We have a sacred duty to fulfill," exclaimed the Prince, maintaining his distance. They were being watched. "You could," stated Edmundo, his voice barely above a whisper. "You are the heir to the throne, Evan. You could do as you please." "I could never abandon my Kingdom." The words were harsh, spoken with unyielding determination. He sighed, adjusting his cape with deliberate ease, as if to reclaim the decorum he had momentarily lost. Edmundo blinked, taking a step forward, his shoulders falling as he saw the other man recoil. "How dare you?" The royal opened and closed his mouth, unsure on how to respond. "How dare I?" he repeated, baffled. "How dare you run from my touch when I have watched you reach heaven from it?" OR: Buck and Eddie are heirs to two crowns, each bound to their own kingdom. To unite the Spanish and English empires, a marriage is arranged between Prince Edmundo Díaz and Princess Madeleine Buckley. Unfortunately for everyone, the wrong princes fall in love.

entry.title: as empty as the inside of me
entry.summary:
Author: twobirdsonesong

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,088Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 74

Summary: “You’re great at this,” Eddie offers. “The kids all love you.” Buck scoffs. He doesn’t mean to, but he does. Denial refusing to go quietly. “Hey,” Eddie chides. “You’re great with them. You’ve been – Chris loves you.”or: Buck has some big emotions after a day of babysitting
